segments.text: I notice the girl standing near the boy, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so expectant and hopeful, reaching out her hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit surprising how patient she is, just waiting for her brother to share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's ever been caught sneaking cookies before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy seems to be the brave one, climbing up to get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit happy seeing their teamwork, even if it's for something mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I also feel a bit fearful, hoping they don't get caught and scolded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene reminds me of the times I used to sneak snacks with my siblings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny how kids can be so clever and sneaky at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
